infos.value: Leonis Castle... What an irksome place to be dragged off to.
At any rate... To think that the stalwart kingdom of Hourne has fallen into a state of civil unrest.
Well, King Jayden will certainly be pleased to hear about these developments.
Ah, get it together, Camillo. Are you really okay with this?
That Machérie girl, she'll be killed, right? Of course she will.
Dammit. What am I even saying...
I've lost my nerve, I have.
She's enough to make me shirk my orders, that one.
I suppose this is farewell, Jayden. I live for the sake of love now.
I may not come riding in on a white horse, and I'm certainly no prince—but I won't rest until you're safe.
